title: Procure a Piece of Heavy Equipment
description: A mining project needs to purchase a new haul truck. The procurement manager must manage the process.

tasks.description: Retrieve the technical specification for the required haul truck.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the specification, detailing the required capacity and features.

tasks.description: Send a request for quotation (RFQ) to several approved heavy equipment manufacturers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the RFQ package to three different vendors.

tasks.description: Evaluate the received quotes and issue a purchase order to the selected vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent evaluates the bids and issues a PO to the vendor with the best offer.
